document.full_text: the mississippi river will be closed to vessels for a 5-mile stretch near caruthersville, missouri, for 8 days beginning at noon cdt (1 p.m. edt) friday due to high water, the u.s. coast guard said.
document.title: mississippi to close at caruthersville, mo, due high water
lines_and_colors: the mississippi river will be closed to vessels for a 5-mile stretch near caruthersville, missouri, for 8 days beginning at noon cdt (1 p.m. edt) friday due to high water, the u.s. coast guard said.
